00031 #ifndef _OPENCV_LINEARSEARCH_H_
00032 #define _OPENCV_LINEARSEARCH_H_
00033 
00034 #include "opencv2/flann/general.h"
00035 #include "opencv2/flann/nn_index.h"
00036 
00037 
00038 namespace cvflann
00039 {
00040 
00041 struct CV_EXPORTS LinearIndexParams : public IndexParams {
00042     LinearIndexParams() : IndexParams(FLANN_INDEX_LINEAR) {};
00043 
00044     void print() const
00045     {
00046         logger().info("Index type: %d\n",(int)algorithm);
00047     }
00048 };
00049 
00050 
00051 template <typename ELEM_TYPE, typename DIST_TYPE = typename DistType<ELEM_TYPE>::type >
00052 class LinearIndex : public NNIndex<ELEM_TYPE>
00053 {
00054     const Matrix<ELEM_TYPE> dataset;
00055     const LinearIndexParams& index_params;
00056 
00057     LinearIndex(const LinearIndex&);
00058     LinearIndex& operator=(const LinearIndex&);
00059 
00060 public:
00061 
00062     LinearIndex(const Matrix<ELEM_TYPE>& inputData, const LinearIndexParams& params = LinearIndexParams() ) :
00063         dataset(inputData), index_params(params)
00064     {
00065     }
00066 
00067     flann_algorithm_t getType() const
00068     {
00069         return FLANN_INDEX_LINEAR;
00070     }
00071 
00072 
00073     size_t size() const
00074     {
00075         return dataset.rows;
00076     }
00077 
00078     size_t veclen() const
00079     {
00080         return dataset.cols;
00081     }
00082 
00083 
00084     int usedMemory() const
00085     {
00086         return 0;
00087     }
00088 
00089     void buildIndex()
00090     {
00091         /* nothing to do here for linear search */
00092     }
00093 
00094     void saveIndex(FILE*)
00095     {
00096         /* nothing to do here for linear search */
00097     }
00098 
00099 
00100     void loadIndex(FILE*)
00101     {
00102         /* nothing to do here for linear search */
00103     }
00104 
00105     void findNeighbors(ResultSet<ELEM_TYPE>& resultSet, const ELEM_TYPE*, const SearchParams&)
00106     {
00107         for (size_t i=0;i<dataset.rows;++i) {
00108             resultSet.addPoint(dataset[i],(int)i);
00109         }
00110     }
00111 
00112     const IndexParams* getParameters() const
00113     {
00114         return &index_params;
00115     }
00116 
00117 };
00118 
00119 } // namespace cvflann
00120 
00121 #endif // _OPENCV_LINEARSEARCH_H_
